challengeFiles.name: styles
script

tests.text: Your myFavoriteFootballTeam.players array should have the value of an object.
Your new object should have a name property.
Your name property should be set to "Sergio Almirón".
Your new object should have a position property.
Your new object should have a number property.
Your new object should have a isCaptain property.
Your new object should have a nickname property.

description:
Inside that players array, create a new object with the following properties:

name: "Sergio Almirón"
position: "forward"
number: 1
isCaptain: false
nickname: null

NOTE: The numbers for the team are organized alphabetically by last name. This differs from conventional numbering where the numbers correspond with what is on the player's jerseys.
